english_example_sentence: You can easily pay this small bill from the bank.
russian_example_sentence: Ты можешь легко оплатить этот маленький счет из банка.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu küçük hesabı bankadan kolayca ödeyebilirsin.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen bu küçük hesabı bankadan kolayca ______.
